fields.title: Membership Terms
fields.content:
Legal Notices

JoziHub Membership Terms

Important Provisions

Binding Contract

These Terms are a contract between you and JoziHub and govern use of this Service. You may not use the Service unless you agree to be bound by and abide by these Terms so it is very important that to read these Terms and any other documents referred to in these Terms very carefully.

You signify agreement with these Terms and to be bound by them if you do either of the following:

  • Agree in writing to these Terms where JoziHub makes an option to do so available to you; or
  • By using the Service in any way, in which case you understand and agree that JoziHub will treat your Service use as acceptance of these Terms from the moment the you first begin to use the Service;
  • You agree that by using the Service, that you are bound by the Facilities Code of Conduct and will abide by the terms of the Facilities Code of Conduct.

How to Interpret Our Terms

Our Terms contain a number of words and phrases which have specific meanings and most of which are capitalised. Our Glossary contains these words and phrases.

We also apply certain rules when interpreting these Terms and you can find our Interpretation Guide which set out these rules below.

Legal Age and Capacity

Members may not use the Service and may not accept the Terms if they -

  • lack the legal capacity to enter into a binding contract with JoziHub (for example, if a user is under the age of 18 are not permitted to access or use this Service under the laws of the Republic of South Africa or other country including the country in which they are resident or from which they use this Service); or
  • require a parent’s or legal guardian’s consent to competently agree to these Terms and fail to obtain that consent.
  • By using the Service Members represent and warrant that they are of full legal age; are emancipated; have their parent or legal guardian’s consent to enter into or are otherwise not legally barred from concluding a contract with JoziHub in the form of these Terms, where appropriate.

Important provisions pertaining to legal liability

These Terms contain provisions which limit JoziHub’s exposure to legal liability and even make Members responsible for a variety of acts. Some of these provisions do have the effect of limiting Members’ rights in law and imposing obligations on Members by virtue of them making use of the Service.

It is therefore important that, as a user, you familiarise yourself with these provisions before you use the Service and that you not use the Service if you do not agree to abide by those provisions. Service Provision

About the Service

This Service allows Members of the JoziHub facilities to access the Facilities in order to support their businesses and further the interests of their businesses. The Member’s level access to the Facilities will vary according the Membership Levels stipulated below.

Membership

Members are required to register as Members in order to make use of the Service by signing these Membership Terms. In order to successfully complete the membership process, you are required to submit certain of your Personal Information to us and, when you do so, you assure us that the Personal Information you submit is accurate, current and complete.

JoziHub will process your Personal Information in terms of JoziHub’s Data Protection Policy which you should read carefully.

JoziHub may take steps to verify the Personal Information you submit once you have completed the requisite registration process and you agree that we may limit or terminate your use of the Service if any of your Personal Information is inaccurate or incomplete.

Membership Levels

Membership to the JoziHub confer varying benefits. These benefits are described in the Membership Benefits Document and the corresponding Membership Fees Schedule.

Fees and Payment

The Member shall, as consideration for access to the Service to be rendered by JoziHub in respect of these Terms, effect payment to JoziHub of its fees which are set out in a corresponding Membership Fees Schedule which has been submitted to the Member by JoziHub and signed by the Member.

The Member shall pay the fees, to JoziHub in the amounts and on the terms stated in JoziHub’s interim and final Membership Invoices issued to the Member from time to time. In the event that JoziHub’s Membership Invoices do not state JoziHub’s payment terms, invoices are payable within 5 days of the Membership Invoice’s date. In the event of the Member failing to timeously effect payment of any amount due to JoziHub in terms of these Terms, JoziHub shall be entitled to suspend the Member’s Membership for any period in which any payment remains outstanding.

If a Member wishes to terminate his or her Membership, the Member must do so giving one calendar month’s written notice and the agreement will terminate at the end of the notice period.

Changes to the Service

JoziHub may add new features to the Service and modify or even discontinue existing features without notice to you and in its sole discretion. You agree to this.

JoziHub will reasonably endeavour to notify you of proposed changes to the Service using you Personal Information.

Changes to these Terms

We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to, and you agree that we may, amend these Terms at any time, in any way and from time to time. We will notify you of proposed changes to these Terms to the amended Terms, in advance of such amendments coming into effect, on the the Service Website. These amendments shall come into effect automatically on their advertised commencement date.

It is your responsibility to review these Terms regularly and to ensure that you agree with any amendments to these Terms. If you do not agree with any amendments to these Terms, you may no longer use the Service.

Dispute Resolution

If any dispute arises between us regarding any provision of these Terms, or its application or termination, then we agree that we will attempt to resolve our dispute informally by means of joint co-operation or discussion between the parties directly involved in the dispute within 5 days after that dispute arises or such extended time period as we may agree to.

In the event we are unable to informally resolve our dispute, that dispute may, at JoziHub’s election, be finally resolved in accordance with the Rules of the Arbitration Foundation of Southern Africa by an arbitrator appointed by the Foundation. Arbitration proceedings shall take place in Johannesburg, South Africa. This clause shall constitute your irrevocable consent to the arbitration proceedings, and you shall not be entitled to withdraw your consent or to claim that you are not bound by this clause. We may, at our discretion, waive this clause and permit our dispute to be resolved using an alternate dispute resolution process.

Any award that may be made by the arbitrator -

  • shall be final and binding;
  • will be carried into effect; and
  • may be made an order of any court to whose jurisdiction the parties to the dispute are subject.

Notwithstanding the aforegoing, nothing in this clause shall be construed as precluding either party from applying to court for a temporary interdict or other relief of an urgent nature, pending the decision of the award of the arbitrator in terms of this clause.

This clause is severable from the rest of these Terms and shall therefore remain of full force and effect even if this agreement is terminated or cancelled for any reason at any time.

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

The Service is controlled and maintained from our facilities in the Gauteng province of the Republic of South Africa. You irrevocably agree that South African Law shall govern thecService and these Terms.

You consent to the jurisdiction of the South Gauteng High Court, Johannesburg, South Africa in respect of disputes which may arise out of your use of the Service and these Terms.

You also irrevocably and unconditionally consent to the jurisdiction of the Magistrates Court even though the value of a claim which we may have against you may exceed the ordinary monetary jurisdiction of the Magistrates Court.

Severability

Any provision in these Terms which is or may become illegal, invalid or unenforceable shall be ineffective to the extent of such prohibition or unenforceability and shall be treated pro non scripto (as if it were not written) and severed from these Terms, without invalidating the remaining provisions of these Terms.

Termination

The Terms will continue to apply until either you or JoziHub terminates these Terms on the one or more of the grounds set out below. You may terminate these Terms at any time by terminating your account and/or ceasing your use of the Service entirely. JoziHub may at any time, terminate its legal agreement with you if:

  • you have breached any provision of the Terms (or have acted in manner which clearly shows that you do not intend to, or are unable to comply with the provisions of the Terms); or
  • JoziHub is required to do so by law (for example, where the provision of the Services to you is, or becomes, unlawful); or
  • the Service provision is or becomes, in JoziHub’s opinion, no longer commercially viable.

Those provisions of these Terms which are intended to survive termination of these Terms shall do so.

Effects of Termination

If your, a Designated User’s or any other user’s account is removed from the Service, the associated Content may also be deleted at our discretion. Content removed may not be recoverable and you agree that it is solely your responsibility for securely backing up or archiving Content posted to the Service or otherwise ensuring that this is done.

The following clauses shall survive these Terms’ termination for any whatsoever:

  • “Content Licensing” (and it’s sub-clauses);
  • “Dispute Resolution”;
  • “Governing Law and Jurisdiction”;
  • “Liability” (and its sub-clauses); and
  • “Glossary”.

Your Privacy

For information about JoziHub’s data protection practices, please read the Data Protection Policy. This policy explains how JoziHub processes your personal information, and protects your privacy, when you use the Services.

You agree to the use of your personal information in accordance with the Data Protection Policy.

Liability

These Terms of use contain provisions which limit our exposure to legal liability and even make you responsible for a variety of acts. Some of these provisions do have the effect of limiting your rights in law and conferring obligations on you by virtue of your agreement to these Terms. References to “you” in this Liability section include the Member where you represent the Member.

Disclaimers and Liability Limitation

Your use of and reliance on the Service is entirely at your own risk. The Service is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis. Although JoziHub takes steps to verify information presented through the Service, JoziHub does not represent or endorse the accuracy or reliability of any advice, opinion, statement or other information linked to or distributed through the Service or information that other Members may make available through the Service. You acknowledge that any reliance upon any such opinion, advice, statement or information shall be at your sole risk.
Information, ideas and opinions expressed or conveyed through the Service should not be regarded as professional advice or JoziHub’s official opinion on any topic and you are strongly advised to seek independent and competent professional advice before acting on such information, ideas and opinions.

To the fullest extent permissible by law, JoziHub disclaims all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including without limitation to the implied warranties that the Service is fit for any particularly purpose.

While JoziHub takes reasonable precautions in our operation of the Service, you agree that neither JoziHub or JoziHub’s Associates shall be liable in respect of any

Losses however arising and whatever the cause, in particular pursuant to and, further, your, a Designated Representative’s or any user’s use of the Service or from any such person’s inability to use the Service.

JoziHub will use reasonable endeavours to make the Service available, and keep the Service available at all times. However, you agree that JoziHub shall not be liable in respect of any Losses caused by or arising from the unavailability of, any interruption in Service use (either in part or as a whole) for any reason whatever.

Indemnity

You indemnify JoziHub and JoziHub’s Associates from any Losses due to or arising out of your, a Designated User’s or any user’s use of the Service or breach of these Terms.

3rd Party Services

Your interaction, correspondence or business dealings with 3rd Parties which are referred to or linked from or to the Service is similarly entirely at your own risk and are solely between you and that 3rd Party including the acquisition, disposal, payment and delivery of any goods or services, and any terms, conditions, warranties or representations associated with such interaction, correspondence or business dealings.

Documents and Notices

We choose the addresses below for all communication purposes under these Terms, whether in respect of court process, notices or other documents or communications of whatsoever nature.

Miscellaneous

You agree that:

  • you are bound by these Terms;
  • data messages addressed by you to us shall be deemed to have been received if and when responded to;
  • you shall be deemed to have been received data messages we address to you as contemplated in section 23(b) of the ECT Act;
  • electronic signatures, encryption and/or authentication are not required for valid electronic communications between you and us;
  • as well as warrant that data messages that you send to us from a computer, IP address or mobile device normally used by you, was sent and/or authorised by you personally.

These Terms constitute the whole agreement between you and us relating to your use of the Service.

No indulgence, extension of time, waiver or relaxation of any of the provisions or terms of these Terms which we may show, grant or allow you shall operate as an estoppel against us in respect of its rights under these Terms nor shall it constitute a waiver by us of any of our rights and we shall not thereby be prejudiced or stopped from exercising any of its rights against you which may have arisen in the past or which might arise in the future.

Nothing in this agreement shall create any relationship of agency, partnership or joint venture between you and JoziHub and you shall not hold itself out as the agent or partner of JoziHub or as being in a joint venture with JoziHub.

Interpretation Guide

In these Terms, headings are for convenience and we don’t intend for them to be used to interpret the Terms.

If, in the Terms, we refer to a party who is liquidated or sequestrated (or has been through a comparable process under a different legal system), then the Terms will also be applicable to and binding on that party’s liquidator or trustee, as the case may be.

Unless we indicate to the contrary in these Terms, any references to any gender includes the other genders, a natural person includes an artificial person and vice versa, the singular includes the plural and vice versa.

When we specify any number of days in the Terms, the number of days excludes the first day and includes the last day unless the last day falls on a Saturday, Sunday or gazetted public holiday in the Republic of South Africa, in which case the last day shall be the next succeeding day which is not a Saturday, Sunday or gazetted public holiday in the Republic of South Africa. Generally speaking, references to a “day” are references to typical business days.

All annexures, addenda and amendments to these Terms form an integral part of these Terms and, therefore, our contract with you.

Glossary

The following words and phrases bear the meanings assigned to them below and related expressions bear corresponding meanings –

  • “3rd Party” means a Party other than the Member and JoziHub;
  • “Content” means all information (such as data files, written text, computer software, music, audio files or other sounds, photographs, videos or other images) which may be protected by copyright;
  • “Data Protection Policy” means the policy document, as annexed hereto, explaining what Personal Information is collected through the Service, how that Personal Information is processed and under what circumstances and to whom this Personal Information may be disclosed;
  • “Facilities” means the facilities provided by JoziHub according to the membership levels mentioned above;
  • “Facilities Code of Conduct” means the code of conduct providing requirements for the use of the Facilities as annexed hereto;
  • “Intellectual Property” means all works, including literary works, pictorial, graphic and sculptural works, architectural works, works of visual art, and any other work that may be the subject matter of copyright protection; advertising, marketing and promotional concepts, ideas, proposals and slogans (whether or not subject to copyright); information; data; formulas; designs; models; drawings; computer programs; including all documentation, related listings, design specifications, and flowcharts; trade secrets; and any inventions, including all processes, machines, and compositions of matter, and any other invention that may be the subject matter of patent protection; and all statutory protection obtained or obtainable thereon;
  • “Intellectual Property Rights” means rights, whether registered or unregistered, including applications for and rights to obtain or use Intellectual Property;
  • “JoziHub”, “our”, “us” and “we” means or are references to Praekelt Foundation NPC trading as JoziHub, a company incorporated in accordance with the laws of South Africa;
  • “JoziHub’s Associates” means JoziHub’s officers, servants, agents or contractors or other persons in respect of whose actions JoziHub may be held to be vicariously liable;
  • “JoziHub Website” means the official website of Jozihub found at www.jozihub.org;
  • “Losses” means all losses (including, but not limited to those in respect of injury, damage to physical property or loss of life), liabilities, costs, expenses, fines, penalties, damage, damages and claims, and all related costs and expenses (including legal fees on the scale as between attorney and own Member, tracing and collection charges, costs of investigation, interest and penalties);
  • “Member” means the person who contracts with us to provide use of the Service to Members, whose details are contained in the Member Details Form annexed hereto;
  • “Membership Benefits document” means the document annexed hereto setting out the services to be provided by JoziHub for the benefit of the Member;
  • “Member Details Form” means the form containing the Personal Information of the Member and details of the Membership option chosen;
  • “Membership Fees Schedule” means the document annexed hereto setting out the particular membership level pertaining to the Member and the corresponding fees for this Membership;
  • “Party” means either JoziHub or a Member as the context may indicate (“Parties” has a corresponding meaning);
  • “Personal Information” bears the meaning contained in the Promotion of Access to Information Act (No.: 2 of 2000), as amended from time to time;
  • “Service” means the provision of access to the Facilities provided by JoziHub;
  • “South African Law” means all and any laws and regulations of the Republic of South Africa, including but not limited to applicable codes of conduct, as may be promulgated or amended from time to time;
  • “Terms” means the terms and conditions which govern use of the Service, as amended from time to time, and which comprise the following –
  • “use” when used in the context of use of the Facilities provided by JoziHub means access to and use of the Facilities by the Member

fields.title: Data Protection Policy
fields.content:
Legal Notices

JoziHub Data Protection Policy

This Policy incorporates the following provisions (and their subordinate provisions) of the Membership Terms terms by reference:

  • How We Interpret Our Terms;
  • Data Protection;
  • Documents and Notices

The provisions incorporated into this Policy from the Terms must be read as being applicable to this Policy, to the extent doing so does not materially change their meaning.

To the extent the provisions of this Policy conflict with the Terms, the provisions of this Policy will prevail to the extent of the conflict.

The defined terms in the Supplementary Glossary in the Policy have specific meanings in the context of this Policy and shall be interpreted in accordance with the principles set out in the Terms.

About this Data Protection Policy

This Data Protection Policy sets out how we process any Personal Information that any person gives us when they use the Service.

If you have any questions about this Data Protection Policy or do not agree with it, please contact us before using the Service. We may change this Data Protection Policy from time to time by updating this page. You should check this page from time to time to ensure you are happy with any changes. This Data Protection Policy is effective from 15 May 2013.

Users are required to agree to this Data Protection Policy as a condition for using the Service.

Information JoziHub Collects from You

We collect Personal Information for the purpose of providing the Service and, specifically, for the reasons set out in this Data Protection Policy.

Personal information users volunteer or which we may infer

All users are required to submit certain Personal Information in order to use the Service. We also collect certain Personal Information automatically which you do not expressly submit to JoziHub. The Personal Information we collect from different users varies depending on the type of the user.

We collect the following Personal Information from you and users:

  • Company or business name, registration number and physical address;
  • Name, title, mobile phone number, email address;
  • Identity number, date of birth;
  • Information regarding your personal or professional interests, demographics, experiences with our products and contact preferences.

We may require you to submit certain Personal Information to the Service and these compulsory fields are designated as such in the relevant forms. We will limit the Personal Information marked as required and will, save for limited advertising purposes detailed below, only process this Personal Information to the extent required in order to deliver, develop and improve the Service, related opportunities and facilitate the Service’s improved administration.

We may intercept and monitor your communications

JoziHub may implement systems designed to intercept and monitor users’ communications with JoziHub’s Associates, to the extent permissible by law, in which case users consent to such interception and monitoring. As part of this process of intercepting and monitoring these communications, we may record such communications for disclosure on the basis set out in this Data Protection Policy.

Security

We are committed to ensuring that users’ Personal Information is securely stored and maintained. In order to prevent unauthorised Personal Information access or disclosure we have put in place appropriate physical, electronic and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure this Personal Information. What we do with the Information We process Personal Information and other Personal Information for the following reasons:

  • Provide and grant access to the Service and notify you, Designated Representatives and/or users about important changes or developments to the Service;
  • Create and maintain a Membership database;
  • Respond to users’ inquiries and complaints or to process users’ requests in relation to their Personal Information;
  • Following up with you or users up as part of our customer care procedures;
  • Internal record keeping;
  • Crime detection prevention and prosecution;
  • Evaluating the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns and for research, training and statistical analysis with the aim of improving the Service; and
  • Improving the Service;
  • To send a newsletter to Members; and
  • Conduct Data Analysis on the aggregated data.

We may contact you, Designated Representatives and/or users by e-mail, phone or mail in relation to the purposes set out in this section and by providing such Personal Information, you and such persons are deemed to have agreed to us contacting them using these methods of communication.

Sharing Your Information

We will not transfer, disclose, sell, distribute or lease users’ Personal Information to third parties other than on the following basis:

  • where we have permission from the person concerned;
  • where we are required to do so by law;
  • where it is reasonably required by our agents, advisors or others involved in rendering the Service or in undertaking activities linked to the operation of the Service on our behalf and only to the extent required; or

This process may include sending Personal Information to other countries, whose data protection laws may not be as extensive as in South African Law. We have, however, taken appropriate and reasonable steps to ensure the same level of protection for the processing carried out in these countries as are afforded by South African Law.

Accessing Your Personal Information

Users who believe that any Personal Information about them which we have is incorrect or incomplete, should contact us immediately. We will correct or update any information as soon as possible.

Any person may furthermore request us to delete their Personal Information stored in relation to the Service although doing so may necessitate limiting or terminating the requesting users’ Service use, at our sole discretion.

Users may request details of Personal Information which we hold about them under the Promotion of Access to Information Act 2000.

Supplementary Glossary

  • “Membership Terms” means the JoziHub Membership Terms which is read with this Policy, found at jozihub.org/membershipterms;
  • “Policy” means this JoziHub Data Protection Policy as read with the Membership Agreement;

fields.title: Code of Conduct
fields.content:
Legal Notices

JoziHub Code of Conduct

The use of the provided by Service is governed by the Membership Terms to which each Member Agrees.

This Code of Conduct incorporates the following provisions (and their subordinate provisions) of the Membership Terms by reference:

  • How to Interpret Our Terms;
  • Documents and Notices.

The provisions incorporated into this Code of Conduct from the Membership Terms must be read as being applicable to this Code of Conduct, to the extent doing so does not materially change their meaning.

To the extent the provisions of this Code of Conduct conflict with the Membership Terms, the provisions of this Code of Conduct will prevail to the extent of the conflict.

You may not use the Service in any way whatsoever except as permitted by the Service’s functionality or otherwise without our prior written permission.

Use of the Facilities

You agree that:

  • Members may only make use of the Facilities in accordance with your applicable membership level and will not exceed your permitted use of the Facilities;
  • No unauthorised persons are permitted to use the Facilities unless written permission is provided by JoziHub;
  • Members using the Facilities must not do so in a manner that disrupts other Members or prevents other Members from using the Facilities in pursuance of the Service;
  • Mobile and electronic devices such as cellular phones, tablets and notebooks must be used in a manner that does not disrupt other Members;
  • Members must not interfere with the performance of JoziHub employees or other Members. Such behaviour includes but is not limited to verbal abuse, intimidation, sexual harassment or harassment on account of race, religion, ethnic background, gender or sexual orientation;
  • Personal property is brought into JoziHub Facilities at the Member’s risk, and remains their responsibility. JoziHub and Praekelt Foundation are indemnified from any Losses sustained by Members to their personal property and Member’s property should not be left unattended.
  • No JoziHub-owned materials, equipment, or property may be taken from the Facilities, except with written authorisation by JoziHub in advance;
  • JoziHub-owned materials, equipment or property must not be tampered with or damaged in any way. This includes desks, tables, computers and internet facilities, systems, networks, programmes or data.
  • Smoking is not permitted in or near the Facilities;
  • The Facilities must be kept clean at all times and any waste disposed of by the members must be done in a manner required by JoziHub;
  • Members are required to leave the Facilities at closing time and when requested during emergency situations and drills or following a violation of this Facilities Conduct of Code.
  • Only animals trained to assist persons with disabilities are permitted in or near the Facilities.
  • Firearms or other deadly weapons, fireworks, explosives and/or explosive devices, or other dangerous devices, are not permitted in or near the Facilities.
  • Members are not permitted to rent, lease, loan, or sell access to the Facilities to 3rd Parties whatsoever.

Use of the networks and Internet Facilities

Recognising the global nature of the Internet, you agree to comply with all local laws, rules and regulations regarding your conduct on the Service.

You agree to adhere to generally acceptable Internet and messaging etiquette. In this regard, without being limited to the examples listed below, you agree not to use the network, and may not permit any aspect of the Service to be used, for or in conjunction with any illegal, unlawful or immoral purposes or as prohibited by these Terms or –

  • in a manner that infringes, violates or misappropriates any 3rd Party’s Intellectual Property Rights or other proprietary rights or contractual rights;
  • submit or otherwise post any person’s Personal Information to the network without that person’s informed, specific and voluntary consent to do so;
  • in a manner that contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment;
  • to send, disseminate or publish unsolicited messages (irrespective of whether they are commercially oriented or not), “chain letters,” materials promoting “pyramid schemes”;
  • to advertise illegal or controlled products or services, or engage in any other advertising or marketing activities that violate the Membership Terms, any applicable laws (including, but not limited to, South African Law), regulatory frameworks or generally-accepted advertising industry guidelines;
  • to fail or refuse to honour an express opt-out of any direct marketing messages in a manner consistent with South African Law;
  • in a manner that is misleading, deceptive or fraudulent or otherwise illegal or promotes illegal activities, including engaging in phishing or otherwise obtaining financial or other Personal Information in a misleading manner or for fraudulent or misleading purposes;
  • in a manner that is defamatory, or in a way that is otherwise offensive, threatening, abusive, violent, harassing, malicious or harmful to any person or entity;
  • in a manner that is harmful to minors in any way;
  • in a manner that is hateful or discriminatory based on race, colour, sex, religion, nationality, ethnic or national origin, marital status, disability, sexual orientation or age or is otherwise objectionable, as JoziHub may reasonably determine from time to time, in its sole discretion;
  • to impersonate JoziHub, any of JoziHub’s Associates, or any other person, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity, or to obtain access to the network without appropriate authorisation;
  • to use the network in such a way as to interfere with network use, so as to constitute a denial, including a partial denial, of service to users;
  • to use any manual or automated means, including agents, robots, scripts, or spiders, to access or manage any user’s account or to monitor or copy JoziHub’s Intellectual Property Rights in and to the Platform; and/or
  • in a manner that employs misleading email or IP addresses, or forged headers or otherwise manipulated identifiers in order to disguise the origin of any Content transmitted through the Service or to users.

Additionally, you agree not to:

  • “Stalk” or otherwise harass anyone;
  • Collect and process any person’s Personal Information without that person’s informed, specific and voluntary consent;
  • Use the JoziHub name in a such a manner as to suggest an unauthorised association between you or your principal and JoziHub;
  • Post any Content depicting or describing child pornography to the Service;
  • Post any Content that JoziHub, in its sole discretion, determines depicts or contains pornography, unwarranted nudity, sexual violence, extreme violence, murder, bestiality, incest, or other similar Content;
  • Use automated means, including spiders, robots, crawlers, data mining tools, or the like to download or otherwise use Personal Information (this does not include Internet search engines (e.g. Google) and non-commercial public archives (e.g. archive.org) that comply with JoziHub’s reasonable restrictions and guidelines for such activities, including through the use of a robots.txt or similar file); and/or
  • Use the network as a generic file hosting service.
  • Circumvent, disable or otherwise interfere with the network’s security related features or any other features that prevent or restrict use or copying of any Content, protect Personal Information or enforce limitations on Service use.

Should you engage in any one or more of the above practices, which shall be determined in our sole discretion (and which decision shall be final), we shall be entitled, without prejudice to any other rights we may have, to:

  • without notice, suspend or terminate your use of the Facilities;
  • Terminate your membership with JoziHub;
  • hold you liable for any costs we incur as a result of your, users’ or a Designated Representative’s misconduct; and/or
  • notwithstanding our Data Protection Policy found on the network disclose any information relating to you, whether public or personal, to all persons affected by your actions as well as to appropriate legal authorities.

fields.title: Membership
fields.content:
Membership

Join now to become part of this highly dynamic, interactive community where tech innovators, business and the research community can collaborate, innovate and incubate.

JoziHub will harness the power of innovation, start-ups and creative collaboration to initiate sustainable progress in Africa. It will also facilitate partnerships between research, private sector and public institutions to support and nurture developers, innovators and start-ups.
JoziHub aims to stimulate a leading network and community of technology and start-up innovators in Africa's commercial hub.
 
  Semi-permanent and permanent workspace
Service Description Cost Benefits
Basic membership On registration the JoziHub member will automatically obtain associated benefits Free (Online application required)
  • Newsletters
  • Innovation related articles
  • Online community
  • Access to
    • Events directory
    • Membership directory
Basic Membership + Open Space Access
Free community access to open JoziHub Space.
Limited space collocated with events hosting area.		 Eligible for free access to open space subject to successful application.
Offered on a first come first served basis.
Basic application process capturing details on member and areas of interest. Access granted if aligned with JoziHub objectives. Annual review of access.
Members expected to accept and follow JoziHub Code of Conduct (including acceptable use policy).		 Free (Online application required)
  • Basic membership benefits
  • Access to open collaboration workspace
  • Access to high speed broadband internet subject to fair usage policy
  • Access to paid for administrative Services e.g. printing
Semi-permanent and permanent workspace Paid for access to semi permanent or permanent working space for fixed contract period.
Access granted to startups and strategic JoziHub partners aligned with JoziHub objectives.
Annual review of access. Members expected to accept and follow JoziHub Code of Conduct (including acceptable use policy).		 60 hours - R800 p/m*
120 hours - R1500 p/m*
Permanent desk - R2550 p/m*
  • Basic membership benefits
  • Access to open collaboration workspace
  • Access to high speed broadband internet subject to fair usage policy
  • Access to paid for administrative Services e.g. printing
  • Access to hot-desk space
  • Event discounts
  • Access to meeting room and conference facilities
 
Apply
Apply
Apply

* Fee can be negotiated on a case by case basis for NGO or social impacted organisation

fields.title: services
fields.content:
Service

Join now to become part of this highly dynamic, interactive community where tech innovators, business and the research community can collaborate, innovate and incubate.

JoziHub will harness the power of innovation, start-ups and creative collaboration to initiate sustainable progress in Africa. It will also facilitate partnerships between research, private sector and public institutions to support and nurture developers, innovators and start-ups.
JoziHub aims to stimulate a leading network and community of technology and start-up innovators in Africa's commercial hub.
 
  Semi-permanent and permanent workspace
Service Description Cost Benefits
Basic membership On registration the JoziHub member will automatically obtain associated benefits Free (Online application required)
  • Newsletters
  • Innovation related articles
  • Online community
  • Access to
    • Events directory
    • Membership directory
Basic Membership + Open Space Access
Free community access to open JoziHub Space.
Limited space collocated with events hosting area.		 Eligible for free access to open space subject to successful application.
Offered on a first come first served basis.
Basic application process capturing details on member and areas of interest. Access granted if aligned with JoziHub objectives. Annual review of access.
Members expected to accept and follow JoziHub Code of Conduct (including acceptable use policy).		 Free (Online application required)
  • Basic membership benefits
  • Access to open collaboration workspace
  • Access to high speed broadband internet subject to fair usage policy
  • Access to paid for administrative Services e.g. printing
Semi-permanent and permanent workspace Paid for access to semi permanent or permanent working space for fixed contract period.
Access granted to startups and strategic JoziHub partners aligned with JoziHub objectives.
Annual review of access. Members expected to accept and follow JoziHub Code of Conduct (including acceptable use policy).		 60 hours - R800 p/m*
120 hours - R1500 p/m*
Permanent desk - R2550 p/m*
  • Basic membership benefits
  • Access to open collaboration workspace
  • Access to high speed broadband internet subject to fair usage policy
  • Access to paid for administrative Services e.g. printing
  • Access to hot-desk space
  • Event discounts
  • Access to meeting room and conference facilities
 
Apply
Apply
Apply

* Fee can be negotiated on a case by case basis for NGO or social impacted organisation
